name: ElectroCourier
description:
The player’s movement is controlled using the arrows or the WASD key. Jump on the enemy’s head to destroy them. It harder to destroy the flying enemies.

Press the ESC key to pause the game and access the options menu. You need to collect at least 75 packages to win.

                                                                               Good Luck

Made by Adam Zuber, Amelia Lewey, Mai Naor, and Nathaniel Heber
